welcome.message: You've made me the happiest person in the world!
welcome.callToAction: Let me show you why you're so special to me...

letter.greeting: To the love of my life,
body: Every moment with you feels like a dream come true. Your smile lights up my world, and your laughter is my favorite sound. You make every day special just by being you.
I want you to know that you mean everything to me. You're not just my Valentine â€“ you're my best friend, my confidant, and the love of my life.
Thank you for being you, for loving me, and for making my life so much better. I can't wait to create more beautiful memories with you.
I love you more than words can express.

messages.text: Every rose represents a reason I love you
You have the key to my heart
You give me butterflies every day
My love for you grows stronger every day

video.title: A Special Message For You
messages: Every moment with you is precious
You make my heart skip a beat
I'm so grateful to have you in my life
